Author: Kid Icarus
Name: Character Select+
Description:
Instant Character Switching Made Simple

Create and save character profiles, then switch between them instantly. Applies Penumbra Collections, Glamourer Designs, Customize+ Profiles, Honorifics, Moodles, and Idles.Key Features: One-click character switching, multiple designs per character, advanced macro support, roleplay profiles, a character gallery, and immersive dialogue options. Perfect for roleplayers, gposers, and anyone who loves seamless character customization without manually switching between multiple plugins.
Punchline: Swap between your OCs with a single click
